entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
